title: Beauty and the Beast cast sing Gaston in amazing new clip from live action reboot
text:
Beauty and the Beast cast sing Gaston in amazing new clip from live action reboot Luke Evans and Josh Gad join together for this ode to manliness Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now See new Gaston clip from upcoming Beauty and the Beast Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Beauty and the Beast fans are in for a post-Oscars treat as Disney has revealed another clip from the live action reboot. 
The classic 1991 animated favourite is being remade with Emma Watson at the helm as Belle, and she's being joined by a stellar cast featuring the likes of Sir Ian McKellen, Dan Stevens and Ewan McGregor. 
Luke Evans has taken on the role of ultra manly Gaston, with Frozen's Josh Gad appearing as his faithful sidekick Le Fou. My, what a guy! (Photo: Facebook) Gaston soaks up the adulation (Photo: Facebook) No one's neck's as incredibly thick as Gaston's (Photo: Facebook) 
Now, as the release date gets closer fans are getting more and more teasers from the blockbuster movie. 
This time, it's a wonderful clip of Le Fou leading the pub in a rousing rendition of Gaston as a tribute to his main man. Le Fou leads the rousing tribute (Photo: Facebook) Certainly a ladies man (Photo: Facebook) Everyone's a fan - perhaps not the Beast (Photo: Facebook) 
It follows a magical clip of Emma's performance of the opening song Belle . 
"Bonjour! Bonjour! Bonjour, bonjour, bonjour!" the townspeople sing at the start of the clip.
